SVGAttributeTextLength.summary: The textLength attribute, available on SVG {{SVGElement("text")}} and {{SVGElement("tspan")}} elements, lets you specify the width of the space into which the text will draw. The user agent will ensure that the text does not extend farther than that distance, using the method or methods specified by the {{SVGAttr("lengthAdjust")}} attribute. By default, only the spacing between characters is adjusted, but the glyph size can also be adjusted if you change lengthAdjust.

remarks.para: By using textLength, you can ensure that your SVG text displays at the same width regardless of conditions including web fonts failing to load (or not having loaded yet).
